DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluate use BI 10773/linagliptin daily ( qd ) fix dose combination ( FDC ) treatment naïve metformin treat patient type 2 diabetes mellitus support approval regulatory authority .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Empagliflozin ( BI 10773 ) / Linagliptin ( BI 1356 ) Fixed Dose Combination Treatment naïve Metformin Treated Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus prior inform consent 2 . Male female patient diet exercise regimen drugnaïve ( define absence oral antidiabetic therapy , glucagon like peptide1 analog insulin 12 week prior randomization ) pretreated metformin ( =1500 mg/day maximum tolerate dose maximum dose accord local label ) unchanged 12 week prior randomisation . 3 . Glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) = 7.0 % = 10.5 % ( = 53.0 mmol/mol = 91.3 mmol/mol ) Visit 1 ( screen ) Exclusion criterion : 1 . Uncontrolled hyperglycemia glucose level > 240 mg/dl ( > 13.3 mmol/L ) overnight fast placebo runin confirm second measurement ( day ) . 2 . Any antidiabetic drug within 12 week prior randomization ( except metformin background therapy define via inclusion criterion 2 ) 3 . Acute coronary syndrome ( nonST elevation myocardial infarction , ST elevation myocardial infarction unstable angina pectoris ) , stroke ( transient ischemic attack ) TIA within 3 month prior inform consent
